content.description:
Sit start the right arete, and move up through a tricky blank/slopey section.   

  A big flake fell of the bottom of this to the detriment of the climb.
content.location: This is the arete right of Crimp My Ride.

content.description:
Sit start the overhanging arete left of Crimp My Ride. Start on crimps on either side the arete, and move up to a nasty pinch before the topout.   

  This is beta intensive and funky.
content.location: Climb the arete left of the obvious crimp line.

content.description:
Crimp My Ride has nice crimping at the grade. Sit start matched at the obvious cool, incut crimp near the center of the wall, and move basically straight up on crimps to the slopey lip. If this were taller, it would be a classic at the grade. 

  The starting hold has a little give in it, so try to grab it near the base at the left side.
content.location: This ascends the pretty obvious back side of the boulder.

content.description: Sit start to the far left on really low crimps, and move right and up to join the problem Crimp my Ride.
content.location: This is on the steep side of the Boulder that faces away from the trail.

content.description: This is a boulder with a nice, steep wall hidden on the backside.
